description: This file defines a Java interface for a Spring Data JPA repository managing NotificationPreference entities, providing method to find preferences by User.

classes.name: NotificationPreferenceRepository
classes.description: Repository interface for NotificationPreference entities with a custom method to find preference by User.

methods.name: findByUser
methods.description: Finds a NotificationPreference associated with a given User, returning an Optional that may contain the preference.
